Class RoomController

java.lang.Object
main.RoomController
public class RoomController extends Object
The RoomController class handles user interactions with the room management screen. It provides functionalities to add, update, delete, and search for room records.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the ComboBox with room type values.

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom()
      Adds a new room to the system. Validates input fields before adding.

    • updateRoom

      public void updateRoom()
      Updates an existing room in the system. Validates input fields before updating.

    • deleteRoom

      public void deleteRoom()
      Deletes a room from the system by its ID.

    • searchRoom

      private void searchRoom()
      Searches for a room by its ID and populates the fields with its details.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType)
      Displays an alert dialog with the specified title, message, and type.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert.
      message - the message to display in the alert.
      alertType - the type of the alert (e.g., INFORMATION, WARNING, ERROR).

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears all input fields and resets controls.

    • handleBackToDashboardButton

      public void handleBackToDashboardButton()
      Handles the "Back to Dashboard" button click event. Navigates back to the dashboard screen.

    • loadScene

      private void loadScene(String fxmlFile, String title)
      Loads a new screen based on the provided FXML file name and title.
      Parameters:
      fxmlFile - the name of the FXML file to load.
      title - the title of the new window.
